contents_items

Class Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • contents_items.Items
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Contents, Room

    public abstract class Items
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract class for processing and storage of the items Development: Need to put the Array Lists of contents in ContentItems and player_list in PlayerItems

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String desc,
                    int weight)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Add an item to an object. First check if the object already has an item with that name. If it has a duplicate inventory, tell user.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item
        desc - The description of the item
        weight - The item's weight
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(PlayerItems player)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Add a player item with player name, item name, item description, item weight
        Parameters:
        player - the object to add
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the ArrayList being added already has that player
